page.title: 17LONGCLIFFE ECOLOGY CENTRE
page.content: Longcliffe Ecology Centre is just past Nanpantan and close to the Golf Course. It covers 20 acres of land and is listed as an area of outstanding scientific and scenic interest. It is a place where students can study wildlife and various ecosystems. There are six types of land surface:- 1. naturally regenerating Charnwood Forest 2. grazed woodland 3. cleared pasture. 4. coppice 5. cultivated land 6. pond area The present owner bought the land in l978. Before that, the area had been neglected. About a hundred years ago,part of the area formed a carriage way and rhododendrons were planted along the drive. Now they cover a rocky area known as Rhododendron Hill.
